languages.text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.
languages.original_text: Раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} любой получаемый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от оружия увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g} на 10% в следующем раунде. Базовое свойство: +10% к броне, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} больше 65.

traits.locale_text: Once per round any incoming damage from weapon attacks grants the wielder +10% armour for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wielder's Strength is more than 65.
Once per round, any incoming damage from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% armour for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's Strength is more than 65.

traits.locale_text:
Один раз за раунд любой входящий урон от атак оружием дает владельцу +10% к Защите на 2 раунда.
+10% к Защите против Ударного урона.

Раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} любой получаемый урон от оружия увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} на 10% в следующем раунде. Базовое свойство: +10% к броне, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} больше 65.

Раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} любой получаемый урон от оружия увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}броню{/g} на 10% в следующем раунде. Базовое свойство: +10% к броне, если значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} больше 65.

languages.text: Una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, cualquier {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de ataques con arma otorga al portador +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} durante el siguiente asalto. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de armadura si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del usuario es superior a 65.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, cualquier daño de ataques con arma otorga al portador +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} durante el siguiente asalto. Propiedad básica de armadura: +10 % de armadura si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del usuario es superior a 65.

languages.text: 当装备者受到武器{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，下一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。此效果每轮只能触发一次。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}高于65，获得+10%护甲。
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者受到武器伤害时，下一轮获得+10%{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}。此效果每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}只能触发一次。 基础护甲特性：如果装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}高于65，获得+10%护甲。

languages.text: Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés lors des attaques à l'aide d'une arme confèrent à l'utilisateur +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} pour le round suivant. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'armure si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 65.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les dégâts infligés lors des attaques à l'aide d'une arme confèrent à l'utilisateur +10 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} pour le round suivant. Propriété d'armure de base : +10 % d'armure si la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de l'utilisateur est supérieure à 65.

languages.text: Einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} gewährt erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch Waffenangriffe dem Träger +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} für die nächste Runde. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % Rüstung, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} des Träger höher als 65 ist.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: Einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} gewähren dem beliebige eingehende Schäden von Waffenangriffen dem Träger +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} für die nächste Runde. Grundeigenschaft Rüstung: +10 % Rüstung, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} des Träger höher als 65 ist.

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}に1回、武器による攻撃で使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、次のラウンドで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g} +10%が付与される。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が65以上の場合、 アーマー +10%
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}につき1回、武器による攻撃で使用者がダメージを受けると、次のラウンドで{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g} +10%が付与される。 基本アーマー特性：使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}が65以上の場合、 アーマー +10%。

languages.text: Her {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} bir kez silah saldırılarından gelen herhangi bir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g}, giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} bir sonraki raunt için +%10 artırır. Taban zırh özelliği: Giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliği 65'ten yüksekse +%10 zırh.
languages.original_text: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, any incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from weapon attacks grants the wearer +10% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} for the next round. Base armour property: +10% armour if the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} is more than 65.
